character.name: Ty & Sasha
description: Your zoologist. Studies animals like his pet, Sasha, to learn new battle strategies. Specializes in <c=keyword>X values</c> and <c=keyword>wild cards</c>, which have self-synergy.

variableHintEnergy.description: X = Your energy after paying this card's cost{{Amount}}.

cardSelectText.forever:
Select a card to add <c=cardtrait>wild</c> to, forever.
(<c=cardtrait>Wild</c> cards power up other wild cards!)
cardSelectText.temp:
Select a card to add <c=cardtrait>wild</c> to for the rest of combat.
(<c=cardtrait>Wild</c> cards power up other wild cards!)

cardSelectText.forever:
Select a card to add <c=cardtrait>wild</c> and <c=cardtrait>buoyant</c> to, forever.
(<c=cardtrait>Wild</c> cards power each other up, <c=cardtrait>buoyant</c> cards are always drawn first!)
cardSelectText.temp:
Select a card to add <c=cardtrait>wild</c> to for the rest of combat and <c=cardtrait>buoyant</c> to forever.
(<c=cardtrait>Wild</c> cards power each other up, <c=cardtrait>buoyant</c> cards are always drawn first!)

XFactor.name: X Factor
XFactor.description: Increase the value of X on all cards by <c=keyword>{0}</c>. <c=downside>Decreases by 1 at the end of the turn.
XFactor.descriptionAlt: Increase the value of X on all cards by <c=keyword>{Amount}</c>. <c=downside>Decreases by 1 at the end of the turn.

ExtremeMeasures.name: Extreme Measures
ExtremeMeasures.description: Increase the value of X on all cards by <c=keyword>{0}</c>.

Predation.name: Predation
Predation.description: After a <c=cardtrait>wild</c> card is played, attack for <c=keyword>{0}</c> damage.

Lycanthropy.name: LYCANTHROPY
Lycanthropy.description: Choose 2 cards that are not <c=cardtrait>wild</c> in your deck. They become wild.

NaturalTalent.name: NATURAL TALENT
NaturalTalent.description: Choose a card that is not both <c=cardtrait>wild</c> and <c=cardtrait>buoyant</c> in your deck. It becomes <c=cardtrait>wild</c> and <c=cardtrait>buoyant</c>.

ChewToy.name: CHEW TOY
ChewToy.description: On your first turn, gain 2 <c=status>X FACTOR</c>.

BabyStarnacle.name: BABY STARNACLE
BabyStarnacle.description: Draw <c=card>+1 card</c> every turn during elite and boss fights.

ScratchingPost.name: SCRATCHING POST
ScratchingPost.description: The first <c=cardtrait>wild</c> card played each turn does +1 damage.

GenomeSplicing.name: GENOME SPLICING
GenomeSplicing.description: Cards with an X value have it increased by the number of <c=cardtrait>wild</c> cards in your hand if they didn't already.

description.None: Choose a card in <c=keyword>hand</c>. It becomes <c=cardtrait>wild</c> for the rest of combat.
description.A: Choose 2 cards in <c=keyword>hand</c>. They become <c=cardtrait>wild</c> for the rest of combat.
description.B: Choose 3 cards in <c=keyword>hand</c>. They become <c=cardtrait>wild</c> for the rest of combat.

description.None: Choose 2 <c=cardtrait>wild</c> cards in your <c=keyword>draw pile</c>. Put them in your hand.
description.A: Choose 3 <c=cardtrait>wild</c> cards in your <c=keyword>draw pile</c>. Put them in your hand.
description.B: Choose a <c=cardtrait>wild</c> card in your <c=keyword>draw pile</c>. Put it in your hand.
